translations.footer: Evodex is open source, get involved.
translations.exchangeStep1: Enter a valid amount and use the dropdown menu to select the token you own and want to exchange.
translations.exchangeStep2: Select the token you wish to receive. We will calculate this amount for you. You can use the reverse icon anytime.
translations.feeStep1: Here you may vote for the fee you consider to be the fairest for each token. The fee must be greater than zero and no larger than 3%.  Please, use a percentage with one decimal format. For example: 0.1%.
translations.liquidityStep1: Here you can look up the current exchange fee for each token using the dropdown menu.
translations.htmlTitleContract: EOS Ricardian Contracts for Evolution DEX
translations.htmlTitleLiquidity: Add or Remove Liquidity to EOS DEX pools on evodex
translations.htmlTitleFee: Vote exchange fees for EOS decentralized exchange dex
translations.htmlTitleExchange: Decentralized Exchange and Liquidity Pools for EOS Tokens
translations.htmlTitleAbout: About evodex a decentralized exchange the evolution of DeFi on EOS

talkUsModal.title: Evodex is for the EOS community.
talkUsModal.subtitle: Get Involved!
talkUsModal.description1: Do you have an idea for a cool feature for evodex?
talkUsModal.description3: Use these communication channels to get in touch. All opinions and suggestions welcome.

liquidity.title: Manage Liquidity
liquidity.description: Select a token pair and the amount you want to add or remove to the liquidity pool.

liquidity.noAmountRemove: Please enter the amount to remove

fee.description: Select a Token Pair and the fee you want to vote for the liquidity pool.
fee.noTokenSelected: Please select a token to continue
fee.minValueAllowed: Fee has to be larger than 0
